Celebrate your success with us!

After many years of running salons and an academy that gives British qualifications to work in the beauty industry, we want to appreciate other businesses in the industry that stand out on the market.

BEAUTY AWARDS KEY DATES
1/30/2023 - 2/13/2023

Early entry

2/28/2023 - 3/28/2023

Evaluation of applications

3/29/2023

Winners announced

GALA DINNER AT HOLIDAY INN, BRENTFORD, LONDON

The final gala will take place on March 29, 2023.

Black Tie event, red carpet, 3-course dinner and some entertainment, as well as an award ceremony for the best companies in the beauty industry.

Show your company and our committee will evaluate your actions and perhaps you will become the leader of your category.
We know that the path to success is not easy, so we invite you to apply to the selected category.

Top Tattoo Salon

Category for tattoo parlors.

Top Professional Business

Category for businesses with a good reputation and professional approach to customers.

Best New Brand

Category for a new business in the beauty industry that has not been open for more than 12 months.

Best Cosmetic

The best cosmetics for face, body and hair care. These can be cosmetics for home care as well as professional lines for salons.

Educator Award

Category for all people who help to obtain permission to work in the beauty industry. Only for schools/academies/trainers with British qualifications.

Hair Salon Award

Category for owners of hairdressing salons.

Semi-pernament Artist Of The Year

Category for permanent makeup artists.

Beauty Salon Of The Year

If you run your own salon or clinic and offer services in the field of face care and body treatments, apply in this category.

See all categories

Find out about the benefits of entering the competition

Close your eyes and imagine that you are hearing that you are the winner of your category ...is probably one of the most exciting messages a brand, product or company can hear.

An invitation to the final gala and winning is a huge success for your brand and benefits

Increasing brand awareness among new recipients and potential customers

Building brand credibility, trust and loyalty among consumers

Industry recognition and new collaboration opportunities with other high-quality brands

Stand out from the competition - there is only one winner

Increasing the sale of your products or services

Presentation of the company during the final gala with media partners

TAKE PART IN LOTTERY

We have been supporting charity campaigns for years, because we know that there are people or institutions that need our support.

We at Little Feet truly believe that ordinary people can make an extraordinary difference. Moreover, our lives in the West are full of abundance and prosperity; we have a moral obligation to share the wealth with those in need. It is our duty as people of the world to ensure that there are no more homeless children.

Our mission statement - Comprehensive assistance to children in difficult or desperate situations:

Helping children to develop their talents and abilitiesHelping children in their educationHelping children and their families in crisisProviding children with courses, trainings, workshopsCultural and educational exchangeProviding comprehensive facilities (building schools, providing accommodation, food, clothing, medical assistance etc.) for children in regions and countries affected by extreme poverty, war or other natural disasters

Charity Number : 1170055

info@little-feet.org.uk

Every month we will send you news in the beauty industry, marketing and PR tips and the latest information about our awards.
